description: The Oklahoma Golf Association Scholarship is open to declared PGA Golf Management majors with a minimum 2.7 cumulative GPA. Eligibility Requirements Declared PGA Golf Management majors Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.7 or higher Students must provide a personal statement outlining career goals and financial need Selection Process Preference given to Oklahoma residents Preference given to students who have successfully completed the Level One (first) 3-month summer internship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
